original_text: I will make grass grow in your fields for your animals to eat. You will have as much food as you want to eat.’
korean_text: 또 가축을 위하여 들에 풀이 나게 하시리니 네가 먹고 배부를 것이라

sentences.original_text: I will make grass grow in your fields
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희 밭에 풀이 자라게 하리라

sentences.original_text: You will have as much food as you want to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 먹고 싶은 만큼 음식을 얻게 될 것이다
